official_title: A bill to extend authorizations for appropriations for the Disaster Relief Act of 1974, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for FY 1986 for Federal disaster relief and for the administrative expenses of the Federal Emergency Management Agency for FY 1986.

titles.title: A bill to extend authorizations for appropriations for the Disaster Relief Act of 1974, and for other purposes.
